item.description: CANCELLED DUE TO SNOW STORM.  This is a new place for us.  Join us after work for a super time!  It’s a nice way to end the week and to mingle and make new friends.  There is no charge.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 2421 Berlin Turnpike:  Berlin Turnpike (Rt. 5/15) becomes Wilbur Cross Highway when heading from Berlin toward Meriden, facility on left opposite Safari Golf.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside in the lounge area.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
